# Pull Request description standards (2026-02-15 10:55Z)

_**User**_

Produire une description de Pull Request pour la branche Git actuelle en analysant les derniers commit effectués sur celle-ci et en respectant les standards GitHub de nommage, syntaxe et formatage. Ne pas inclure de captures d'écrans et ne pas indiquer de clotures d'issue GitHub.

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Agent)**_

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>

The user wants me to produce a Pull Request description for the current Git branch by analyzing the latest commits on that branch, following GitHub standards for naming, syntax, and formatting. They don't want screenshots or GitHub issue closures included.

I need to:
1. Get the current branch name
2. Get the commits on this branch (compared to main/master)
3. Analyze the changes to understand what was done
4. Write a PR description following GitHub conventions

Let me start by getting the Git information.
</details></think>

---


Analysant la branche Git actuelle et les derniers commits pour rédiger la description de la Pull Request.
